title: Best of The Program | Guests: Bill O’Reilly & Robert Epstein | 10/30/20
description:
Amazon has banned ads for a new book about the risks of transgenderism, “Irreversible Damage.” Glenn Greenwald, co-founder of The Intercept, resigned as the site continues to censor reports on Joe and Hunter Biden. Bill O’Reilly breaks down the week’s biggest news stories, including UPS finding Tucker Carlson’s missing Hunter Biden documents. Dr. Robert Epstein gives a great update on his Big Tech election monitoring system and previews what its found so far.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
